name: Ruba Abu-Salma
tagline: Ph.D. Student at University College London (UCL)
body:
I am a Ph.D. student in the Department of Computer Science at University College London (UCL), under the joint supervision of Prof. [M. Angela Sasse](http://sec.cs.ucl.ac.uk/people/m_angela_sasse/) and Dr. [Sarah Meiklejohn](http://www0.cs.ucl.ac.uk/staff/S.Meiklejohn/). We belong to the Information Security Research Group and UCL Academic Center of Excellence for Cyber Security Research. Broadly, I research user-centered and secure messaging. I aim to understand how users perceive secure messaging, and compare that with the actual underlying security of different messaging tools.

My research is funded by a Google Research Award, supporting "open-source secure messaging development research".
